co2calculatorPACTA2022 1.2.1
  • Get started
  • Reference

    Gather and Validate Parameters for CO2 Emission Calculations

    get_parameters.Rd

    This function validates the input parameters and prepare the input_args list for further processing . by the getParams function. It ensures that all mandatory parameters are present and correctly formatted, and it collects information about any refurbishments that have been carried out.

    get_parameters(
  area,
  floors,
  year,
  utilisation_key,
  climate_code,
  energy_carrier,
  walls_refurb_year = NULL,
  roof_refurb_year = NULL,
  windows_refurb_year = NULL,
  floor_refurb_year = NULL,
  heating_install_year = NULL
)

    Arguments

    area

    Mandatory, numeric. Area (in square meters) where heating or cooling is required ("Energiebezugsfläche").

    • e.g. 1000

    floors

    Mandatory, numeric. Number of floors within the building envelope ("thermische Gebäudehülle").

    • e.g. 4

    year

    Mandatory, numeric. Year of building construction.

    • e.g. 1981

    utilisation_key

    Mandatory, numeric. Main utilisation of the building according to SIA 380/1:2009.

    The following utilisations are possible:

    • 1: Wohnen Mehrfamilienhaus

    • 2: Wohnen Einfamilienhaus

    • 3: Büro

    • 4: Schulen

    • 5: Verkauf

    • 6: Restaurants

    • 7: Versammlungslokale

    • 8: Spitäler

    • 9: Industrie

    • 10: Lager

    • 11: Sportbauten

    • 12: Hallenbäder

    Check the full dataset using utilisation.

    climate_code

    Mandatory, string. Abbreviation code of the assigned climate station according to "Auszug aus Merkblatt SIA 2028:2015".

    The following climate stations are available:

    • ABO: Adelboden

    • AIG: Aigle

    • ALT: Altdorf

    • BAS: Basel-Binningen

    • BER: Bern-Liebefeld

    • BUS: Buchs-Aarau

    • CDF: La Chaux-de-Fonds

    • CHU: Chur

    • DAV: Davos

    • DIS: Disentis

    • ENG: Engelberg

    • FRE: La Frétaz

    • GLA: Glarus

    • GSB: Grand-St-Bernard

    • GUT: Güttingen

    • GVE: Genève-Cointrin

    • INT: Interlaken

    • KLO: Zürich-Kloten

    • LUG: Lugano

    • LUZ: Luzern

    • MAG: Magadino

    • MVE: Montana

    • NEU: Neuchâtel

    • OTL: Locarno-Monti

    • PAY: Payerne

    • PIO: Piotta

    • PUY: Pully

    • ROB: Robbia

    • RUE: Rünenberg

    • SAM: Samedan

    • SBE: San Bernardino

    • SCU: Scuol

    • SHA: Schaffhausen

    • SIO: Sion

    • SMA: Zürich-MeteoSchweiz

    • STG: St. Gallen

    • ULR: Ulrichen

    • VAD: Vaduz

    • WYN: Wynau

    • ZER: Zermatt

    Check the full dataset using climate.

    energy_carrier

    Mandatory, string. Energy carrier used for heating and domestic hot water production.

    The following energy carriers are available:

    • oilHeating

    • gasHeating

    • other

    walls_refurb_year

    Optional, numeric, default value NULL. Year of wall refurbishment.

    • e.g. 2010

    Supply NULL or NA if no refurbishment has taken place since the year of building construction.

    roof_refurb_year

    Optional, numeric, default value NULL. Year of roof refurbishment.

    • e.g. 2010

    Supply NULL or NA if no refurbishment has taken place since the year of building construction.

    windows_refurb_year

    Optional, numeric, default value NULL. Year of window refurbishment.

    • e.g. 2010

    Supply NULL or NA if no refurbishment has taken place since the year of building construction.

    floor_refurb_year

    Optional, numeric, default value NULL. Year of basement floor refurbishment.

    • e.g. 2010

    Supply NULL or NA if no refurbishment has taken place since the year of building construction.

    heating_install_year

    Optional, numeric, default value NULL. Year of heating installation.

    • e.g. 2010

    Supply NULL or NA if no heating replacement has taken place since the year of building construction.

    Value

    A list containing all validated and formatted input parameters, including any refurbishment details.

    Examples

    params <- get_parameters(
  area = 1000,
  floors = 5,
  year = 1980,
  utilisation_key = 3,
  climate_code = "ZER",
  energy_carrier = "gasHeating",
  walls_refurb_year = 2010,
  roof_refurb_year = 2015
)
